name: Chess Invaders (HauntedQuest)
description:
Enemy ships have invaded the chess board!

Move your pieces around to destroy the ships before they can shoot your piece. Colliding with an enemy ship will destroy it, but the enemy bullets will destroy your pieces. If the king gets hit by a bullet, the game ends.

Controls:

Mouse: Left-click on piece to select it, then click on the appearing green fields to move it around.

Font: Press Start 2P by codeman38 (https://www.1001fonts.com/press-start-2p-font.html)

Everything else was made by me.
